TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
you should have saved some for later!

Waiter my soup is very @ColdJ can you warm it up?

Here, put this hot potato in it to warm it up.

Waiter, is this sublime soup?

This is super lime soup.

Waiter! Are you sure that lime is white powder, rather than green fruit?

Depends what lime it is. You didn't specify.

Waiter, there's 1,000 TNT minecarts on one rail block in my soup! (It's a Minecraft thing, if you don't get it.)

3 hours ago, TwoCalories said:

Depends what lime it is. You didn't specify.

Waiter, there's 1,000 TNT minecarts on one rail block in my soup! (It's a Minecraft thing, if you don't get it.)

Ah its part of the planned demolition of a hundred meter radius of the city!

Waiter, there is a... uhh... soup in my soup's soup soup bowl!

Yes, here is an underground soup river. We are taking from it.

Waiter! Piranha sushi, please.

So, you want to become the sushi of our aquarium piranhas? Deal.

Waiter, there is soup in my bowl!

Whoops! Terribly sorry sir, let me take it out for you.

Waiter, there's a pool party in my soup!

Yes, sir. You can see infusoria, bacteria, amoebas, and even a wom from that pool.

Beertender! I don't want just something beer, I want the beest.

One beer soup with extra croutons, coming up.

Waiter: There is a no fly zone in my soup.

That's why you are putting the flies on the table around...

Waiter! Why did you take this crawdad from crawmom and crawkids?

It wasn't me, actually. It was the fisherman that sold us the fish. I actually have his number right here, do you want to have a chat with him?

Waiter! The soup keeps exploding in my face, sending hot liquid flying everywhere, and it's very inconvenient.

Thanks, now we know that our volcano soup is functional.

Waiter, my soup has a [MISSING] texture

You should have added the correct files!

Waiter, there is an exact copy of our entire universe, with me telling you there is a fly in my soup, in my soup.

if you gaze long into a soup, the soup also gazes into you. 

Waiter! A big soupburger, please.

Okay! A burger made of soup! *Spills off of plate*

Waiter! There's an F-35B Lightning II attempting vertical takeoff in my soup.

These carriers... Always occupying our soups...

Waiter, my soup is USA territory!

Oh man, I still remember the invasion...

Waiter, the US Pacific Fleet is in my soup!
waiter there is a in my soup

Look better. B and C should be also there, it's an alphabet soup.

Btw. Waiter! Where s the "space" character?

It's the little gaps between the pasta.

Waiter, 

On 7/23/2023 at 11:29 AM, TwoCalories said:

the US Pacific Fleet

is still in my soup!

Send the Soviet Union to take care of it

Waiter, there is gluten in my gluten free soup!

Free gluten! Hands off soup!

Waiter! Three quark portions with gluonten!

Upd.
Done.
 

Spoiler

Like these ones, but on the white-blue plate.

Edited July 26, 2023 by kerbiloid

But sir, your three servings of quark are right on the plate!

Unfortunately, they're quite small, so try to make them last.

@Aerodynamic Kerbal, the Soviet Navy and the USN are having a naval battle in my soup after you put the USSR in!

Waiter: the Universal Salt Shaker Registered, should not be placed in the soup.

Customer: Waiter, there is a big red button in my soup that says "Don't Click This"
